title: Why I cannot spectating my friends' games anymore after I upgrade the client?
body: I saw other friends spectating games normally, but mine is shut down. I cannot click the option of spectating. Does anybody know what happened? I just spectated a games yesterday, so I guess there will not be an issue of my friends block me away.

replies.body:
Spectating hasn't been brought to the Beta Client just yet. I'd recommend launching into the Legacy Client if you'd like to spectate your friends. You can do so by clicking the *Launch Legacy* button at the login screen for the Beta Client.

Let me know if you have any questions.
